phrases.original: Hello, {FIRST-NAME}! Although your login is accurate, you'll still need to get authorized before you can start using the Invites App. Just follow the instructions below.
phrases.translated: Hello, {FIRST-NAME}! Although your login is accurate, you'll still need to get authorized before you can start using the Invites App. Just follow the instructions below.

phrases.original: Find someone who can authorize you.
phrases.translated: Find someone who can authorize you.

phrases.original: Within your congregation there are other registered users of the Invites App who have the necessary access to authorize you. You'll need to find one of them.
phrases.translated: Within your congregation there are other registered users of the Invites App who have the necessary access to authorize you. You'll need to find one of them.

phrases.original: Here's a list of authorizing users.
phrases.translated: Here's a list of authorizing users.

phrases.original: When you have found someone who can authorize you, click on the button below ('Show QR Code'). A QR Code will appear. Ask them to authorize you by scanning it.
phrases.translated: When you have found someone who can authorize you, click on the button below ('Show QR Code'). A QR Code will appear. Ask them to authorize you by scanning it.

phrases.original: As soon as you are authorized, you will be notified via e-mail, and also the QR Code above will disappear.
phrases.translated: As soon as you are authorized, you will be notified via e-mail, and also the QR Code above will disappear.

phrases.original: Please authorize {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} to use the Invites App, by scanning the QR Code below.
phrases.translated: Please authorize {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} to use the Invites App, by scanning the QR Code below.

phrases.original: Please find the following person in the fellowship, and explain that you would like to be authorized to use the Invites App:
phrases.translated: Please find the following person in the fellowship, and explain that you would like to be authorized to use the Invites App:

phrases.original: Please find any of the following people in the fellowship, and explain that you would like to be authorized to use the Invites App:
phrases.translated: Please find any of the following people in the fellowship, and explain that you would like to be authorized to use the Invites App:

phrases.original: No authorizing users were found in your congregation.
phrases.translated: No authorizing users were found in your congregation.
